Description: Salesforce CRM automates the sales process with an array of cloud-based tools.
Name: Salesforce Sandbox

Methods.Name: Create Case
Methods.Description: Creates a new case which represents a customer issue or problem.

Methods.Name: Update Case
Methods.Description: Updates a case.

Methods.Name: Delete Case
Methods.Description: Deletes a case.

Methods.Name: Get New Cases
Methods.Description: Get the new cases added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: List Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of accounts from Salesforce.

Methods.Name: Update Account
Methods.Description: Updates an account.  An account represents an organization or person involved with your business such as customers, competitors, and partners.

Methods.Name: Delete Account
Methods.Description: Deletes an account.

Methods.Name: Get New Accounts
Methods.Description: Get the new accounts added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Create Account
Methods.Description: Create a new account. An account represents an organization or person involved with your business such as customers, competitors, and partners.

Methods.Name: Get Account
Methods.Description: Get the account by ID.

Methods.Name: Get Accounts By PersonEmail
Methods.Description: Gets a list of accounts from Salesforce by PersonEmail. This call will fail if Person Account types are not setup.

Methods.Name: Get Accounts By Custom Field
Methods.Description: Gets a list of accounts from Salesforce by a custom field.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Accounts
Methods.Description: Get the accounts updated in Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Update Event
Methods.Description: Updates an existing event.

Methods.Name: Create Event
Methods.Description: Create a new event.

Methods.Name: Delete Event
Methods.Description: Deletes an event.

Methods.Name: Get New Events
Methods.Description: Get the new events added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: List Events
Methods.Description: List events from this Salesforce account.

Methods.Name: Delete Opportunity
Methods.Description: Delete the opportunity.

Methods.Name: List Opportunities
Methods.Description: List the opportunities from this Salesforce account.

Methods.Name: Update Opportunity
Methods.Description: Updates information about an opportunity which would represent a sale or pending deal.

Methods.Name: Get New Opportunities
Methods.Description: Get the new opportunities added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Create Opportunity
Methods.Description: Creates a new opportunity which would be a sale or pending deal.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Opportunities
Methods.Description: Get the opportunities updated in Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Opportunity Stages
Methods.Description: Get the possible stages for an opportunity in Salesforce.

Methods.Name: Create Opportunity Contact
Methods.Description: Adds an existing Salesforce contact to an opportunity.

Methods.Name: Create Task
Methods.Description: Creates a new task such as making a phone call or other to-do items.

Methods.Name: Update Task
Methods.Description: Updates a task.

Methods.Name: Delete Task
Methods.Description: Deletes a task.

Methods.Name: Get New Tasks
Methods.Description: Gets the new tasks added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: List Tasks
Methods.Description: List tasks from this Salesforce account.

Methods.Name: Get Task Priorities
Methods.Description: List the options for Task Priorities.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Tasks
Methods.Description: Gets the tasks updated in Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Task Statuses
Methods.Description: List the options for Task Statuses.

Methods.Name: Get New Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets the new contacts added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Contact(s) By Mobile Number
Methods.Description: Gets contact(s) by the mobile number.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new contact.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates a contact's details.

Methods.Name: Get Contact ID
Methods.Description: This method will retrieve the Salesforce Contact ID with a look up by email address.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a contact.

Methods.Name: Get Contact(s) By Email
Methods.Description: Gets contact(s) by the email.

Methods.Name: Describe Contact
Methods.Description: Completely describes the individual metadata at all levels for the Contact object.

Methods.Name: Get All Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets all contacts in Salesforce.

Methods.Name: Contact Exists for Email Address
Methods.Description: Checks whether any Contacts exist for the given email address.

Methods.Name: Contact Exists for ID
Methods.Description: Checks if a contact exists with a given ID.

Methods.Name: Get Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets user updated contacts added to Salesforce since the last time the process was run in this Cycle.

Methods.Name: Get Contact by ID
Methods.Description: Retrieves a contact with the given unique ID value.

Methods.Name: Delete Lead
Methods.Description: Deletes a lead.

Methods.Description: Creates a new lead which represents a prospect or potential opportunity.

Methods.Description: Updates a lead which represents a prospect or potential opportunity.

Methods.Description: List leads from this Salesforce account by Email.

Methods.Description: Get lead by ID
